nodes.text: The Quingarus Deluxe Droid Systems Factory was a droid factory located on a planet close to the Coruscant system.

The factory was owned by the Toong Quingarus. During the Clone Wars, he got a loan with the InterGalactic Banking Clan, who threatened him to produce a new model of battle droid for them as payment. The facilities were secured for the Galactic Republic, as Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi secured a deal with Quingarus to have all the Republic's astromech droids maintained by his factory.
